DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study study relationship obesity , hormone menopausal status , breast cancer . The researcher would like study whether type nutritional intervention , call time-restricted diet tRD , easy maintain use smartphone application ; researcher also want study effect tRD weight control , hormone , breast tissue . A tRD type diet require people restrict daily eat specific time frame day . The researcher think might effective manageable way control weight .
DOC.brief_title: Time Restricted Diet Obese Overweight Pre Postmenopausal Participants
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I. Feasibility foster adherence self-monitoring dietary intake use smartphone application ( app ) . II . Feasibility goal follow time-restricted diet . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . Identify potential molecular biomarkers and/or signature explore efficacy normalization metabolism . II . Assess systemic endocrine effect time restrict diet ( tRD ) intervention overweight obese pre postmenopausal woman . III . Assess weight change follow tRD intervention . IV . Evaluate effect tRD intervention , identify specific reproducible genomic signature , breast sample obtain random fine needle aspiration tRD study population . V. Assess volume parenchymal enhancement magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) . OUTLINE : Participants follow time restrict diet , restrict daily eat 8 hour time window 12:00-8:00 pm . Participants allow consume non-caloric beverage ( water , black tea , black coffee , diet soda , etc . ) fast hour require record daily food consumption smartphone app 6 month . Participants also coach telephone approximately 10-15 minute weekly 1 month biweekly 5 month . After completion , participant follow 3 month .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must stable weight ( gain lost 25 pound last 6 month ) Subjects must normal mammogram within 9 month prior registration ; NOTE : subject must also normal breast exam day preintervention random fine needle aspiration ( rFNA ) Subjects must body mass index ( BMI ) 2540 Subjects must fit ONE follow menopausal category : Premenopausal ( n = 40 ) define meet follow criterion : Have least 8 menstrual cycle past 12 month Have hormonal contraception past 3 month prior registration Have serum hormone parameter ( estradiol [ E2 ] , progesterone , follicle stimulate hormone [ FSH ] ) premenopausal range day rFNA ; NOTE : subject selfreport menopausal status registration , confirmation hormonal parameter occur registration part preintervention procedure ; misassignment status , recruitment future subject adjust accordingly Postmenopausal ( n = 40 ) define meet follow criterion : Last menstrual period ( LMP ) > 1 year previously Have hormone use past 3 month prior registration Serum E2 , progesterone , FSH postmenopausal range day rFNA ; NOTE : subject selfreport menopausal status registration , confirmation hormonal parameter occur registration part preintervention procedure ; misassignment status , recruitment future subject adjust accordingly Subjects must Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 0 1 Subjects diagnose prior cancer site ( breast cancer ) may participate long medical therapy least 12 month prior registration Subjects prior breast cancer must systemic therapy ( include endocrine agent ) least 2 year prior registration Subjects must willing undergo random fine needle aspiration ( rFNA ) begin end intervention period Subjects must willing able abstain use aspirin least 2 week prior undergo rFNA procedure ( pre postintervention ) Subjects must ability understand willingness sign write informed consent prior registration study Subjects must smart phone ( new generation Android Iphone ) able track food intake time Subjects must willing restrict food intake 8 hour period every day ( 12 pm 8 pm ) Subjects receive hormonal contraception and/or hormone therapy past 3 month eligible Subjects pregnant and/or lactate eligible Subjects note ( upon initial online screening ) 150 minute moderate level physical activity week , get less 8 % calorie saturate fat , eat 5 fruit vegetable serving per day eligible Subjects part structure weight loss program ( e.g . Weight Watchers , etc . ) eligible Subjects undergone bariatric surgery eligible Subjects work night shift eligible Subjects diabetes uncontrolled hypertension eligible ; NOTE : purpose study , uncontrolled define diastolic pressure 100 mmHg
